name: Show_App_Desk
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(APP Node in Desk Preference,Hardware Design Selection - EAPP Node,Node Supplier_EAPP,Additional Hard Disk_EAPP,Displays_EAPP,Display Size_EAPP,Ent_app_desk_tpm,Display Supplier_EAPP,ServerLocClusNetwork_Group_ACE_T)*>
[IF]([IN](<*VALUE(Interface with TPS Required?)*>,Yes,No,)){<*SETOPTIONAL(Additional Memory_EAPP)*><*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Memory_EAPP)*>}{<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Additional Memory_EAPP)*><*SETREQUIRED(Additional Memory_EAPP)*>}[ENDIF]
<*xDisallowallValuesExcept(ServerLocClusNetwork_Group_ACE_T:<* LIST ( SELECT AttValue FROM ClusterAttValues WHERE CAST (AttValueCode AS float) <= '<*CTX( Container(List of Locations/Clusters/Network Groups).Rows.GetCount )*>' ) *>)*>
